p:
Elevated levels of furin expression were able to facilitate MERS-CoV pseudovirion infection, and viral entry could be reduced by furin siRNA silencing.
20
Decanoyl-RVKR-chloromethylketone ( 23, dec-RVKR-CMK), a furin inhibitor, was shown to block MERS-CoV S protein-mediated entry as well as virus infection, with an IC 50 value of 75 Î¼M in HEK-293T cells. Furthermore, when cathepsin inhibitor camostat was used in combination with 23, a significant inhibition in infectivity was characterized compared to camostat alone.
20 Recently, Bestle et al., showed that the potent peptidomimetic inhibitor MI-1851 ( 24) could prevent proteolytic processing of the S protein from SARS-CoV-2 by endogenous furin in HEK293 cells. However, no antiviral data is available for 24 yet.
117 The peculiar furin-like cleavage site (S1/S2-site in Figure 2 ) in SARS-CoV-2 that is absent in the SARS-CoV and other SARS-like CoVs indicates that furin inhibitors could play a significant role in blocking the viral entry process.
117, 118
